roleset.name: utter suddenly

example.name: transitive
example.text: When Johnson ejaculated `` Howsabout my buying us all a nice cold Co-cola ,Ma'am '' ? ? [*T*-3] Mrs. Roebuck smilingly declined and began suddenly [*-2]to go on about her son , who [*T*-1] was `` onleh a little younguh than youbawhs '' .
example.arg: `` Howsabout my buying us all a nice cold Co-cola , Ma'am ''? ?

example.name: Both args
example.text: Benny's ejaculation of "there he goes!" caused the police to change directions in pursuit of the thief.

roleset.note:
EJACULATE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from ejaculate.01-v)
EJACULATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with ejaculate.01 (from ejaculation.01-n)

roleset.name: orgasming

example.name: Arg0
example.text: The many medications Bob was on impaired his ejaculation.

roleset.note: EJACULATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with cum.01 (from ejaculation.02-n)
